skill.name: seo-analysis
skill.description: SEO analysis and optimization specialist. Use when conducting technical SEO audits, optimizing meta tags, analyzing Core Web Vitals, or improving search engine rankings. Focuses on actionable recommendations.
skill.summary: SEO analysis and optimization specialist. Use when conducting technical SEO audits, optimizing meta ...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and guidance. No executable code, no network access, no filesystem access, no external command execution. Safe for installation.

content.value_statement: SEO analysis helps improve website visibility in search engines. This skill provides actionable recommendations for technical SEO, meta tags, Core Web Vitals, and schema markup to boost rankings.
actual_capabilities: Conduct technical SEO audits of website structure and crawlability
Optimize title tags and meta descriptions for better click-through rates
Analyze Core Web Vitals metrics (LCP, FID, CLS) and suggest improvements
Implement structured data and schema markup
Improve internal linking structure and anchor text
limitations: Cannot access live websites to perform automated scans
Cannot modify files or deploy changes directly
Cannot generate real-time performance metrics without external tools

use_cases.title: Fix technical SEO issues
use_cases.description: Identify crawlability problems, redirect chains, and canonical issues affecting search rankings.

use_cases.title: Optimize meta tags
use_cases.description: Create compelling titles and descriptions that improve click-through rates from search results.

use_cases.title: Improve page performance
use_cases.description: Receive actionable recommendations for Core Web Vitals to enhance user experience and SEO.

prompt_templates.title: Basic SEO audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a technical SEO audit of my website and identify the top issues affecting search rankings.

prompt_templates.title: Meta tag optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Optimize the meta title and description for my homepage to improve click-through rates.

prompt_templates.title: Core Web Vitals
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my Core Web Vitals scores and suggest specific improvements for LCP, FID, and CLS.

prompt_templates.title: Schema implementation
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement schema markup for my product pages to enhance search result appearance.

output_examples.input: Analyze my website's SEO and suggest improvements
output: ‚Ä¢ Missing XML sitemap - Create and submit to search engines
‚Ä¢ Title tags too short on 12 pages - Expand to 50-60 characters
‚Ä¢ No Open Graph tags - Add og:title and og:description
Core Web Vitals: LCP 3.2s (needs improvement), FID 45ms (good), CLS 0.15 (needs improvement)
Priority Actions: 1) Fix LCP by optimizing hero image, 2) Add proper image dimensions to prevent layout shifts

best_practices: Focus on user intent when optimizing content for target keywords
Ensure website is fully crawlable before addressing other SEO factors
Monitor Core Web Vitals regularly as they directly impact rankings
anti_patterns: Keyword stuffing in titles and descriptions
Using duplicate meta descriptions across multiple pages

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for SEO analysis tasks.

faq.question: What are the character limits for meta tags?
faq.answer: Title tags should be 50-60 characters. Meta descriptions should be 150-160 characters.

faq.question: Can this skill scan my live website?
faq.answer: The skill provides guidance and recommendations. Use external tools for automated website scanning.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill that processes text locally without sending data to external services.

faq.question: Why are my Core Web Vitals scores low?
faq.answer: Common causes include large images, render-blocking resources, and layout shifts. The skill provides specific fixes for each metric.

faq.question: How is this different from online SEO tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides expert guidance and recommendations rather than automated scanning. Combine with tools like PageSpeed Insights for best results.
